title: The LOS as laid down under Regulation No 27, may be provided as per note therein
clause_text: The LOS as laid down under Regulation No 27, may be provided as per note therein. The additional LOS, if any, may be provided on the podium.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The LOS as laid down under Regulation No 27, may be provided as per note therein. The additional LOS, if any, may be provided on the podium.
